help-file.title: "WRAITHFORM"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Enchantment
When under the influence of Wraithform a necromancer can walk unseen by mortal eyes, undetected by any spells. Doors and walls are meaningless to anyone under the influence of Wraithform as well. After casting the spell, anything the caster happens to be wearing or carrying at the time will fall to the ground.
